title: Ewer, 1686–1701
markings: Marks: On bottom in underglaze blue: "AK (for Adriaen Kocks, owner of De GriekscheA factory 1686-1701.
provenance: A. Aronson, Amsterdam; Phelps Warren (1964) (purchased at Antiques Dealers'Fair, Amsterdam)
description: Straight-sided circular body, long pointed spout one side, large looped handle opposite side; domed foot with flattened knop middle of stem; painted in underglaze blue on white with dark outlines (trek), chinoiserie designs of figures and flower vases in reserves, floral & diaper patterns.

tombstone.epitaph:
Ewer, 1686–1701.
1686–1701. Tin-glazed earthenware. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-53.
